sentence.text: Herein, we designed a retro-inverso isomer of lLc(LyP-1), termed lDc(LyP-1), expecting to inspire brain metastatic tumor targeted drug delivery.
Further, lLc(LyP-1) modified PEG-PLA micelles displayed much higher in vivo distribution in brain metastatic tumor than lDc(LyP-1).
All results suggested that lLc(LyP-1) had a better performance than lDc(LyP-1) in brain metastatic tumor-targeted drug delivery
